name: Eastern Rome
startIntroPart1: Emperor Heraclius of the Eastern Roman Empire
startIntroPart2: After the fall of western rome to its many enemies and its own corruption, what remained of the empire was to the east, and their emperor Heraclius stood strong against the invading persian army and fought them back, though he try to restore rome to its full might, eventually the eastern roman empire would budge as well. You, Emperor Heraclius must lead your people to greatness once more through your many cultural feats, or bloodshed if must.
declaringWar: I am sorry its come to this friend, but i must restore the Roman empire. May god have mercy on your people.
attacked: My empire will not fall this day, good luck in what comes next.
defeated: First the west, now the east. The sun sets on what was the dream... of Rome.
introduction: You near lands belonging to I, Heraclius. Byzantium welcomes you.
hateHello: You, who mocks us, comes to our lands?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: God has bestowed upon both of us, a message of peace and tranquility of our peoples.
tradeRequest: I come to you with this generous offer.
uniqueText:
Gain [+8 Culture] for every [200 faith]. Upon capturing a city, receive 5 times its [Gold] production as [Faith] immediately.
                May choose [1] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion, Stratego is earned 75% faster.
